directions.step:
Select firm, medium-sized apples. Wipe & core. Put in a baking dish & fill each cavity with sugar & cinnamon or nutmeg. (A great flavor is to add 1 teaspoon red-hots candy to each apple.) Cover bottom of dish with boiling water & bake at 400 until apples are soft, basting often with syrup in dish. Serve hot or cold with whipped cream. (This dish may be served with any menu.)
DEBRA MAULDIN
